last_episode_to_air.name: Juneau, Froyo and Ronald Reagan
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gina is torn after getting an offer to sell Valley Hills to a rival assisted living residence; Drew prepares to leave on his big trip to Alaska.

name: B Positive
overview: Faced with finding a kidney donor, newly divorced dad Drew is at the end of his rope when he runs into Gina, a rough-around-the edges woman from his past who volunteers her own. Together they form an unlikely bond and begin a journey that will change both of their lives.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Drew, a recently divorced father, discovers he needs a kidney and finds his donor in the last person he ever would've imagined.

episodes.name: Die Alysis
episodes.overview: When Drew's condition worsens, he needs to make sure Gina is still serious about donating her kidney and winds up making her an offer she can't refuse.

episodes.name: Foreign Bodies
episodes.overview: As Gina makes herself at home in Drew's house, Drew begins to question whether he made the right decision.

episodes.name: Joint Pain
episodes.overview: After Drew goes through a rough divorce mediation with Julia, Gina gives him a surprise to boost his spirits.

episodes.name: High Risk Factor
episodes.overview: Drew downloads a tracking app to keep an eye on Gina after he begins getting concerned about her reckless behavior.

episodes.name: Open Heart Surgery
episodes.overview: Gina needs to keep herself together to pass a psych evaluation while dealing with the news of an ex's engagement.

episodes.name: Phantom Limb
episodes.overview: After missing Maddies soccer game due to dialysis, a depressed Drew begins to question if all his sacrifices are worth it.

episodes.name: Integration Therapy
episodes.overview: Drew realizes he lost all of his friends after his divorce, which prompts Gina to throw a party for his dialysis group.

episodes.name: B Negative (1)
episodes.overview: Drew and Gina start thinking about their futures after Jerry gets a surprise call that he's receiving a new kidney.

episodes.name: B Negative (2)
episodes.overview: Drew falls into a deep depression after a friend's failed kidney surgery, and it's up to Gina to help him out of it.

episodes.name: Recessive Gina
episodes.overview: Gina takes Drew and Norma on a road trip to track down her father's medical records.

episodes.name: Canine Extraction
episodes.overview: Gina has three days to teach Cannoli the dog new tricks before his owner returns from overseas. Also, Drew must deal with Maddie growing up, at a new time.

episodes.name: Inflammatory Response
episodes.overview: Norma moves into Drew's house after she accidentally sets her room on fire at the retirement home. Also, a romance heats up between Gina and Eli.

episodes.name: Love Life Support
episodes.overview: Gina sabotages her relationship with Eli after he invites her to a wedding in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Miss Diagnosis
episodes.overview: Drew has his first date since his divorce and Gina helps Eli prepare for an important interview.

episodes.name: A Cute Asphyxiation
episodes.overview: Drew and Gina struggle in their new relationships. Also, Norma plans a trip to Italy with Gina.

episodes.name: Transplanticipation
episodes.overview: Gina and Drew plan their futures now that their surgery is finally scheduled.

episodes.name: Life Expectancy
episodes.overview: Before their surgeries, Gina looks for a new apartment while Drew celebrates his last day of dialysis.

episodes.name: Love, Taxes and a Kidney
episodes.overview: As Gina and Drew adjust to life after surgery, Drew develops romantic feelings for someone new, and Gina gets surprising news about a friend’s death.

episodes.name: Vermont, Switzerland and Connecticut
episodes.overview: Gina and Eli’s relationship is tested by Gina’s new wealth. Also, Drew gets a surprise visit from his long-distance girlfriend, Adriana.

episodes.name: Bagels, Billiards and a Magic Show
episodes.overview: On Gina’s first day as the new owner of the retirement home, she asks Drew for help getting through to a short-tempered resident whose wife is sick.

episodes.name: Baseball, Walkers and Wine
episodes.overview: Gina comes up with a plan to help a resident, Meredith, get some space from her overprotective husband; Drew work up the courage to tell Gina he has feelings for her.

episodes.name: Novocaine, Bond and Bocce
episodes.overview: Gina tries to convince Jerry to move into the senior center after he faints at work; Drew and Gina deal with the emotional fallout of their drunken night out.

episodes.name: A Dishwasher, a Fire and a Remote Control
episodes.overview: Gina is pressured by the seniors at Valley Hills to fire the chef; a frustrated Drew blows up at one of his therapy patients.

episodes.name: A Camper, a Compass and a Cannoli
episodes.overview: Gina brings her dog Cannoli to the retirement home where he bonds with the seniors; Drew prepares for his new life driving cross country in a camper van.

episodes.name: A Dog, a Mousse and a Bat
episodes.overview: Gina promises to help Harry give his ailing wife a special anniversary dinner; Drew connects with a charming young woman while on the road.

episodes.name: Heartburn, Woodstock and Ribs
episodes.overview: Drew returns from his road trip to be with Gina and the retirement home residents and staff and mourn the death of a beloved friend.

episodes.name: S'mores, Elvis and a Cubano
episodes.overview: Gina gets a surprise visit from her sister, Natalie; Drew and Harry start a road trip together but have different destinations in mind.

episodes.name: Louisville, Bubbaroo and Sully
episodes.overview: Gina hires Peter's son to be her lawyer, but things get complicated when he asks her out; Drew and Harry's van breaks down during their road trip, leaving them stranded.

episodes.name: Dagobah, a Room and a Chimney Sweep
episodes.overview: Gina is overwhelmed when all the seniors at Valley Hills compete for a fancy upgraded room; Drew and Harry finally arrive at the Grand Tetons; but Drew doesn't have the epiphany he hoped for.

episodes.name: A Boss, a Bear Claw and a Defibrillator
episodes.overview: Gina struggles with being both a boss and a friend to Gabby and Gideon; Drew volunteers to drive the Valley Hills van; Jerry learns he's healthy enough to leave Valley Hills.

episodes.name: Osteoporosis, a Thaaang and a Slinky
episodes.overview: Gina gets caught in the middle when Norma's rude sister, Irene, arrives at Valley Hills; Harry sets up Drew on a date; Spencer and Bette take the next step in their relationship.

episodes.name: Payroll, a Waterwall and Valley Forge
episodes.overview: Gina struggles to keep Valley Hills running smoothly after Mrs. Ludlum quits and starts work at a rival assisted living facility; Drew wonders whether he should go on another road trip adventure or stay close to Gina.

episodes.name: Juneau, Froyo and Ronald Reagan
episodes.overview: Gina is torn after getting an offer to sell Valley Hills to a rival assisted living residence; Drew prepares to leave on his big trip to Alaska.
